concepts.name: Sequel is in a Different Genre

results.deck: By far the most popular Dungeons and Dragons tabletop campaign setting, the Forgotten Realms franchise is even more popular for video games. Parent to several landmark RPGs such as Baldur's Gate and Neverwinter Nights, the Forgotten Realms logo holds a lot of credibility – and expectations.
